definition: a computer connected to the internet that maintains a series of web pages on the World Wide Web, assign a location to
details:
noun
- a computer connected to the internet that maintains a series of web pages on the World Wide Web
= example: a computer connected to the internet that maintains a series of web pages on the World Wide Web
= synonyms: web site
- physical position in relation to the surroundings
= example: physical position in relation to the surroundings
= synonyms: situation
- the piece of land on which something is located, or is to be located
= example: the piece of land on which something is located, or is to be located
= synonyms: land site
verb
- assign a location to
= synonyms: place
